title: Verifying email not working for hotmail?
body:
Hey, I'm trying to verify my league account and I am having trouble finding the verification email in my inbox in hotmail.com
Please help! Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you checked your "Spam" or "Junk" mail boxes?
Yeah, I've checked my spam and junk boxes and have also deleted everything in my inbox since it was quite full. After cleaning it up, I requested another verification email and still nothing sadly.

I would recommend trying a different email address with a different provider or alternatively [contacting Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) as they may have further knowledge about any issues relating to verification emails.
Yeah i've got it now. Thanks bunch.
